channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Public Preview of Airflow/OpenLineage Support in Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Microsoft Purview now provides an endpoint that supports collecting lineage from Apache Airflow via integration with OpenLineage, an open framework for data lineage collection and analysis. This capability is now in public preview. This endpoint accepts OpenLineage payloads (assets & lineage) in the Data Map. The capability is available via both UX and API.
Teams across Microsoft and OpenLineage community have partnered closely on this effort. The work has also laid the foundation to integrate asset and lineage information from more data sources that support OpenLineage (such as Spark, d...

item.title: Integration of Azure Machine Learning with Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Previously in the blog post Bringing ML assets to the Microsoft Purview Data Map we announced the public preview of Azure Machine Learning assets in Microsoft Purview. With the integration, AI/ML and data professionals can benefit from data discovery, lineage tracking and responsible AI governance in the whole MLOps lifecycle. The integration is only available for the enterprise version of Microsoft Purview.
Source registration You can find a new source type named “Azure Machine Learning” in Microsoft Purview Data Map to register your Azure Machine Learning workspace. After the registration,...

item.title: Microsoft Purview expands data estate support – Amazon Redshift and Tableau
item.description:
Microsoft Purview enables organizations to easily create a comprehensive, up-to-date map of their data landscape across on-premises, multi-cloud, and SaaS applications with automated data discovery. Purview keeps expanding the data system coverage to meet our customers’ diverse needs. We are glad to announce the latest integration with Amazon Redshift and Tableau.
Amazon Redshift | Public Preview Microsoft Purview now supports scanning Amazon Redshift to extract metadata including server, databases, schemas, tables/views and their columns, stored procedures, and functions. To try it out, reg...

item.title: Enhanced Snowflake integration in Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Microsoft Purview keeps strengthening its Snowflake integration to help you enrich your data map with metadata from Snowflake. We are glad to share some new features available in Snowflake scan.
When setting up a scan for Snowflake source, you can now:
Choose different flavors of integration runtime to power the scan:
Default Azure integration runtime: use this when both Snowflake and Microsoft Purview allow public access. You don’t need to set up anything to use this type of fully managed runtime. Managed Virtual Network integration runtime: applicable when your Snowflake allows public ac...

item.title: Introducing new version of Managed Virtual Network in Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Managed Virtual Network (VNet) in Microsoft Purview enables the scenario when your Microsoft Purview and/or data systems restrict network access, you can run the scan on the Managed VNet Integration Runtime (IR) – a fully managed service by Purview – to securely connect to them via private endpoints.
We heard your growing demand and feedback for this solution, and we’re excited to announce that the new version of Managed Virtual Network support is now available.
We have built on top of the existing architecture (diagram below). There are several advantages of using the new version of Manag...
